# Project Setup Instructions

## Project Type
Next.js 14 Application with App Router, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS

## Tech Stack
- Next.js 14 (App Router)
- TypeScript (Strict Mode)
- Tailwind CSS v3.3
- shadcn/ui
- Firebase
- Socket.io
- PWA Support
